summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Garfield Street, from Fifteenth Avenue North to Seventeenth venue North et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading and constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 13973 creating Local Improvement District No. 1281 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
